title: The Education of Henry Adams - "To the boy Henry"

content.question: The phrase "To the boy Henry Adams" in the second paragraph functions primarily as

choices.label: a device meant to encourage the reader’s empathy
an indication of a narrative shift from general to specific
a means of introducing structural irony in the passage
an implication that one boy’s point of view is unique and radical

content.answer: an indication of a narrative shift from general to specific

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe the narrator or speaker of a text.
